topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c4640b63687218e48f0000#post_53c4640b63687218e48f0000
Ahh I see.

Yeah, My other bro graduated a month ago. Ironically for his party we went out to eat. Funny, I was making jokes telling him to Gorden Ramsay the food.

As for the fanfiction, it cant be as bad as the horrible (Yet fucking hilarious) bullshit I read.

Something about Kaiba from Yu-gi-oh writing in a dairy about the stuff he was doing while he was on drugs.
!https://31.media.tumblr.com/09126e9293ca525c2c426adef2a4c108/tumblr_inline_n8q4ifXHzo1rjodc5.png!
Not gonna get into it, but most of it is Murder, animal abuse, gay sex, and more. and at some point, Guy sex and murder at the same time.

You can thank my sister for reading me some of it.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c466e763687230fde00000#post_53c466e763687230fde00000
Basically, you play as a guy who can turn into various species of prehistoric animal. I haven't got a storyline in mind yet, but he gets his powers from a secret pagan society.

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c46789636872074ea60200#post_53c46789636872074ea60200
. . . Okay I'm going to stop you here:
There's a 99% chance you're bitting off more than you can chew.  Realistically speaking a trained professional working by themselves can get maybe two hours of gameplay out with two years of development.  Take two hours, divide it by four and instead make a short thirty minute game that way the goal line is far more realistic.
